game.name: Knightfall
game.description:
The mighty knight is in big trouble and you are his only choice to get him defended against a horde of dangerous monsters. Would you like to assist him on this biggest battle of the planet? If so, join Knighfall and be prepared to guide him to face off a big horde of deadly monsters. Luckily, he is blessed with a sharp weapon so you do not need to bother about the insane attacks of your enemies. Fight like a champion and clear the area from these blood-thirsty souls in this brand new clicker-adventure game!

The best part is that he will run automatically but you have to take of the attack part. Make sure to keep tapping or clicking the screen to promote your character use his weapon. Finish all of the deadly souls to earn enough cash to clear the present level in this HTML5 platform game! Control him wisely otherwise heartless enemies will kill him and you will lose the game immediately! Use the currency you earn along the way to buy armour, spells, potions and other trinkets!

Guide your character through all the levels and show the world that the spirit of a true fighter exists within you! Make sure to leave more and more damage on your enemies so that you will earn the maximum amount of money. Your good performance will surely help to bag for the maximum achievements and rewards and make your profile powerful on atmegame.com. We are happy to offer you a wide range of free adventure games that are free to play online without download. Stay connected with us to find new action-packed challenges every day by just having a few clicks!
